name: Muhammad Sex Simulator 2015
description:
Muhammad Sex Simulator 2015 is a game made by Encyclopedia Dramatica member gizmo01942 as both a response and tribute to the Charlie Hebdo terrorist attack.

The game is basically a sex simulator in which you can make the the Prophet Muhammad have sex with men or a variety of animals.

As you can probably guess, it was made to offend the hell out of anyone who is Muslim, can't tolerate mockery of religious figures, or anyone who opposes free speech, best summed up by Gizmo himself:

It should be obvious, but I want to make it clear this is not intended as a serious attack on anyone's faith nor is it meant as a serious critique of any real-life historical figures. It's virtual scat porn. It's gross, offensive, and meant to elicit strong feelings that range from disgust to amazement. It is not meant to be used to incite hatred against a religion. It is meant as a statement of free speech absolutism, refuting the idea that any religious, historical or political figure should enjoy protected status above that of everyone else. Defacto rules born of fear that limit criticism of an idea or person only serve to increase resentment toward that idea or person. I refuse to be part of that cycle of hate.
